statements: INSERT INTO Music (id, title, artist) VALUES (1, 'Song 1', 'Artist 1') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET title = EXCLUDED.title, artist = EXCLUDED.artist;
INSERT INTO Music (id, title, artist) VALUES (2, 'Song 2', 'Artist 2') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET title = EXCLUDED.title, artist = EXCLUDED.artist;
INSERT INTO Music (id, title, artist) VALUES (3, 'Song 3', 'Artist 3') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET title = EXCLUDED.title, artist = EXCLUDED.artist;
UPSERT INTO artists (id, name, genre) VALUES (1, 'Artist1', 'Rock')
UPSERT INTO artists (id, name, genre) VALUES (2, 'Artist2', 'Pop')
UPSERT INTO artists (id, name, genre) VALUES (3, 'Artist3', 'Hip hop')
UPSERT INTO artists (id, name, genre) VALUES (1, 'Artist1', 'Pop') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name), genre = VALUES(genre)

UPSERT INTO albums (id, title, release_date, artist_id) VALUES (1, 'Album1', '2022-01-01', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = VALUES(title), release_date = VALUES(release_date), artist_id = VALUES(artist_id)
UPSERT INTO songs (id, title, duration, album_id) VALUES (1, 'Song1', 240, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title = VALUES(title), duration = VALUES(duration), album_id = VALUES(album_id)
UPSERT INTO Artist (id, name, genre) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'Pop') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = EXCLUDED.name, genre = EXCLUDED.genre;

UPSERT INTO Album (id, title, release_date, artist_id) VALUES (1, 'My Album', '2022-01-01', 1) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET title = EXCLUDED.title, release_date = EXCLUDED.release_date, artist_id = EXCLUDED.artist_id;

UPSERT INTO Song (id, title, duration, album_id, artist_id) VALUES (1, 'My Song', 180, 1, 1) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET title = EXCLUDED.title, duration = EXCLUDED.duration, album_id = EXCLUDED.album_id, artist_id = EXCLUDED.artist_id;
INSERT INTO artists (artist_id, artist_name) VALUES (1, 'Artist 1') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE artist_name = 'Artist 1';
INSERT INTO albums (album_id, album_name, release_date, artist_id) VALUES (1, 'Album 1', '2022-01-01', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE album_name = 'Album 1', release_date = '2022-01-01', artist_id = 1;
INSERT INTO songs (song_id, song_name, album_id) VALUES (1, 'Song 1', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE song_name = 'Song 1', album_id = 1;
